course_title: Inter.Topics Luso-Afro-Braz.St: Media in the Lusophone World
course_description: Intermediate-level studies of the language, discourse, literature, and/or culture of the Portuguese-speaking world. May be taught in English or Portuguese. Students may take multiple PORT 285 courses provided that they focus on different topics.
